    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BasicFidelityCard
     
    CLUI
     
    Coordinate
     
    Courier
     
    Customer
    Represents a customer in the Foodora system.
    DeliveryPolicy
    Interface defining the strategy for selecting a courier for delivery.
    FairOccupationPolicy
    A delivery policy that aims to distribute orders fairly among couriers.
    FastestDeliveryPolicy
    A delivery policy that selects the courier who can deliver the order in the shortest time.
    FidelityCard
     
    IDGenerator
     
    LeastOrderedHalfMealPolicy
    Policy that analyzes half-meal orders and ranks them by least popularity.
    LeastOrderedItemAlaCartePolicy
    Policy that analyzes a la carte items and ranks them by least ordered (ascending order).
    LotteryFidelityCard
    A fidelity card implementation that provides a chance to win a free meal.
    Main
     
    Manager
    Manager class representing system administrators in the Foodora system.
    Meal
     
    Meal.MealSize
     
    Meal.MealType
     
    Menu
     
    MenuItem
     
    MenuItem.Category
     
    MenuItem.Type
     
    MostOrderedHalfMealPolicy
    Policy that analyzes half-meal orders and ranks them by popularity (most ordered first).
    MostOrderedItemAlaCartePolicy
    Policy that analyzes individual menu items ordered a la carte and ranks them by popularity.
    MyFoodoraSystem
     
    Order
     
    Order.OrderStatus
     
    OrderSortingPolicy
    Interface for analyzing and sorting orders based on different criteria.
    PointFidelityCard
    A fidelity card implementation that works on a points system.
    Restaurant
    Represents a restaurant in the Foodora system.
    TargetProfitByDeliveryCost
    A target profit policy that adjusts the delivery cost to meet the target profit.
    TargetProfitByMarkup
    Implementation of target profit policy that adjusts the markup percentage.
    TargetProfitByServiceFee
    Implementation of target profit policy that adjusts the service fee.
    TargetProfitPolicy
    Interface for different strategies to achieve a target profit by adjusting various fee parameters.
    User
    Abstract base class for all users in the Foodora system.
